data.title: How to watch Penguins of Madagascar Season 1 outside the US
data.meta_description: Calling out all the comedy fans, everyone’s favorite, quirky, and commando-like penguins in Penguins of Madagascar are now available for streaming on
data.text:
Calling out all the comedy fans, everyone’s favorite, quirky, and commando-like penguins in Penguins of Madagascar are now available for streaming on Paramount Plus. Whether it’s Private, Skipper, Rico, or Kowalski, each of them is set to protect their home, New York’s Central Park Zoo, from the mischievous Mort, Maurice, and King Julien XIII. What follows is comedic chaos that will have you fall in love with this action-packed animated movie like never before!

Before you get too excited, Paramount Plus does not work outside the US, which means you can’t watch it unless you’re connected to a trusted VPN. Keep reading to learn how to watch Penguins of Madagascar Season 1 outside the US by using a high-quality VPN!

How to watch Penguins of Madagascar Season 1 outside the US

You can now stream Penguins of Madagascar Season 1 on Paramount Plus from anywhere in the world, thanks to PureVPN. Bypass all geo-blocks and watch your favorite shows and movies on the platform without any interruptions.

Here’s how you can do it.

Subscribe to PureVPN

Install the VPN app on your device.

Connect to the US-based server.

Head to the Paramount+ website or app, then log in or sign up.

You can now watch Penguins of Madagascar Season 1 outside the US!

Where to watch Penguins of Madagascar Season 1 outside the US?

Penguins of Madagascar Season 1 is available for streaming on Paramount Plus. You can also find the series on Microsoft Store, Google Play Movies, Amazon Video, and Vudu. The DVD for the series is also available in all stores, so don’t forget to purchase it.

Why Paramount Plus is restricted outside the US?

Paramount Plus is restricted outside the US due to licensing agreements and copyright laws. The channel does not have broadcasting rights for other regions, which is why you can’t access it anywhere else. This is why you keep getting halted with an error message when trying to access Paramount Plus from outside the US.

Luckily, PureVPN is here to get you out of this trouble. You can change your IP address with the VPN and appear as a US resident on Paramount’s servers. After this, you can enjoy hassle-free streaming of your favorite Paramount Plus shows and movies.

Penguins of Madagascar was released on Paramount Plus on June 21, 2023.

What is the Storyline of the Penguins of Madagascar Season 1?

Penguins of Madagascar is an animated series that ran from 2008-2015. Skipper, Kowalski, Private, and Rico go on multiple daring adventures to protect the penguins living in New York’s Central Park Zoo from the villain; King Julien XII, Maurice, and Mort. You will find these commando-like birds tackling inter-animal conflicts, fighting the villains, and dealing with zookeeper Alice in a fun and comical way throughout the series.

It’s a light-hearted show focusing on the importance of teamwork, resourcefulness, friendships, and maintaining balance to protect their own. Don’t miss out on this light-hearted yet comical series, which is bound to take you on a fun journey through the Central Park Zoo.

What is the Episode Count of Penguins of Madagascar Season 1?

You can stream all 31 episodes of Penguins of Madagascar Season 1 on Paramount Plus.

What is the Cast of Penguins of Madagascar Season 1?

There are several voice actors in the Penguins of Madagascar Season 1, such as:

Tom McGrath as Skipper

Jeff Bennett as Kowalski

John DiMaggio as Rico

James Patrick Stuart as Private

Danny Jacobs as Julien

Andy Richter as Mort

Kevin Michael Richardson as Maurice

Nicole Sullivan as Marlene

No. Paramount Plus is a paid streaming platform.

Where can I watch Penguins of Madagascar Season 1 for free?

Unfortunately, there’s no way to watch Penguins of Madagascar Season 1 for free. You have to purchase Paramount’s subscription or buy a DVD to stream it on your screens. In case you’re outside the US, then you will need a top-notch VPN to bypass geo-restrictions for easy streaming.

No. Penguins of Madagascar won’t be available for streaming on Netflix anytime soon.
